name: hrms-fullstack-monorepo
description: Full-stack HRMS application with React + Vite frontend and Express + Prisma backend

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix server & npm run dev --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npm run prisma:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
